Comments: EF1 TORNADO CONFIRMED BY NWS DAMAGE SURVEY. MOSTLY TREES DOWN. ONE TREE DOWN ON A HOUSE. (RNK)
AN EF1 TORNADO TRACKED ABOUT 0.6 TENTHS OF MILE IN THE TOWN OF HURT. EIGHT STRUCTURES WERE DAMAGED. TWO HOMES HAD TREES THAT HAD FALLEN THROUGH THE ROOF. (RNK)
A BRIEF TOUCHDOWN OF AN EF0 TORNADO OCCURRED NORTH OF EPSONS ROAD. IT DOWNED AND SNAPPED MAINLY SOFTWOOD TREES. THE TORNADO WAS ON THE GROUND FOR 75 YARDS. (RNK)
FIRE FIGHTER SAW MUTIPLE TOUCHDOWNS OFF HIGHWAY 264. (MHX)
DAMAGE TO HOMES ON RIVER ROAD. RELAYED FROM 911 CENTER (MHX)
REPORT FROM HIGHLY EXPERIENCED STORM CHASER. (PUB)
